text: Robert Bakker (born 9 December 1962) is a Dutch rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Netherlands Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Mijdrecht
title: Robert Bakker (rower)
